content_summary: Overview of AWS services, global infrastructure, and developer tools.
code_example:
# AWS CLI Setup
aws configure
aws s3 ls

content_summary: Understanding IAM users, groups, roles, and policies for secure access control.
code_example:
# Create IAM User
aws iam create-user --user-name dev-user

content_summary: Learn how to launch and manage EC2 instances for scalable compute.
code_example:
# Launch EC2 Instance
aws ec2 run-instances --image-id ami-0abcdef1234567890 --instance-type t2.micro

content_summary: Build serverless functions using AWS Lambda and deploy automatically.
Learn how to store and retrieve objects in S3 buckets.
code_example:
# Create Bucket
aws s3 mb s3://hiredai-learning-data

content_summary: Understand how to use DynamoDB for NoSQL data storage and querying.
code_example:
# Create Table
aws dynamodb create-table --table-name Users --key-schema AttributeName=UserId,KeyType=HASH

content_summary: Build and deploy REST APIs using API Gateway with Lambda integrations.
code_example:
# Deploy API
aws apigateway create-rest-api --name 'HiredAI API'

content_summary: Implement asynchronous communication using SNS and SQS queues.
code_example:
# Publish SNS Message
aws sns publish --topic-arn arn:aws:sns:us-east-1:123456789012:MyTopic --message 'Hello World!'

content_summary: Learn how to monitor application metrics and trace requests.
code_example:
# Create Log Group
aws logs create-log-group --log-group-name hiredai-dev-logs

content_summary: Automate AWS resource creation using YAML/JSON templates.
code_example:
Resources:
  MyBucket:
    Type: AWS::S3::Bucket
    Properties:
      BucketName: hiredai-cloud-bucket

content_summary: Deploy scalable web apps using Beanstalk environments.
code_example:
# Deploy App
eb init && eb create hiredai-env && eb deploy

content_summary: Learn to build and deploy containers using ECS and ECR.
code_example:
# Build Docker Image
docker build -t hiredai-app .
# Push to ECR
aws ecr create-repository --repository-name hiredai-app

content_summary: Securely manage secrets, API keys, and encryption.
code_example:
# Encrypt Data
aws kms encrypt --key-id alias/my-key --plaintext fileb://data.txt

content_summary: Automate CI/CD workflows for AWS deployments.
code_example:
# Create Pipeline
aws codepipeline create-pipeline --cli-input-json file://pipeline.json

content_summary: Learn how to monitor and optimize AWS costs effectively.
code_example:
# Cost Explorer
aws ce get-cost-and-usage --time-period Start=2025-10-01,End=2025-10-31
